name: umbrelos
description: Umbrel is a self-hosted OS and app platform for running personal servers. It provides a one-click app store for Bitcoin, Lightning, Nextcloud, and more, managed via an easy-to-use web dashboard.
features: App store: Install apps with one click from a curated store including Bitcoin, Nextcloud, and media servers.
Web dashboard: Manage your server and apps through an intuitive web interface accessible from any browser.
Bitcoin node: Run a full Bitcoin and Lightning node for sovereign financial operations.
Automatic updates: Keep apps and the OS updated automatically with minimal manual intervention.
App management: Start, stop, and configure apps easily without command-line knowledge.
User-friendly: Designed for non-technical users to run their own server without complexity.
Privacy-focused: Host your own services and data without relying on third-party cloud providers.
Raspberry Pi support: Run on affordable hardware like Raspberry Pi for low-cost self-hosting.
Backup and restore: Protect your data with built-in backup and restore functionality.
Community apps: Access community-contributed apps beyond the official store.
Remote access: Access your server securely from anywhere with built-in remote access features.
Resource monitoring: Monitor system resources and app performance from the dashboard.
